评论概述: Paisley hippie stretch pants for women
评论详情: These stretch pants will probably fit many sizes. They are very colorful but super long. I used them for Halloween and had to roll up the waist. But they were great for dressing like a hippie.

These hippie costume pants are super comfy and stretchy, making them perfect for long wear. The elastic high waist and flare leg design really enhance your curves, while the bold floral print adds a fun, retro vibe. They’re great for themed parties, Halloween, or just casual daily wear, and the soft fabric feels great all day. I also love that they’re machine washable, which is a huge plus.  The sizing is pretty accurate, but I recommend checking the size chart to ensure the best fit. They pair perfectly with crop tops or tank tops for a full retro look.

评论概述: very cute but not on me!
评论详情: First of all no pictures, but I am between 193 to 200 on depending on the day or the hour and at 5'2" this 67-year-old body is definitely a lumpy apple shape.  Amazon recommended people my size to order an xl.  The pattern was exactly what I wanted, the 2xl would have arrived mid-October, later than I need them, so I ordered the xl, because I wear between 18w and 20w and after reading the reviews, I hoped they would fit.  Although, the pants are stretchy they were much too tight on my upper thighs and abdomen.  I did loved the pattern  and if I had the right size, they would be very comfortable.  I ordered a 2xl in a different pattern and it is just the nature of my body, Yoga pants are not for me.  It's like taking a sack of potatoes and expecting them not to show the lumps and to stretch out farther than they were designed to.
Runs small. Ordered size bigger than I usually wear but still won't fit me.
